viewData.name: Acer 17.3" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Acer 17.3" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop featuring 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core, 16GB of DDR4 RAM | 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD 17.3" FHD 1920 x 1080 144 Hz IPS Display. Review Acer Helios 300
viewData.long_description: Play your favorite PC games in style with Acer 17.3" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop, complete with a textured metal finish and a black/red color scheme. The keyboard also has red backlighting.
